name: Verify stage progression
description: Verify that completing stage objectives triggers proper progression to the next stage/level
testObjective: Validate the stage progression system and ensure proper state transitions between game stages
author: QA Team
preconditions: Player is at a stage with progression objectives
Stage objectives are defined and trackable
Player has required items/skills to complete objectives

steps.action: Load a save at the beginning of a stage
steps.expected: Stage loads with objectives displayed in UI
Each objective is marked as complete in the UI as it's finished

steps.action: Trigger stage progression (e.g., sleep/use door/talk to NPC)
steps.expected: Stage transition sequence begins (cutscene, loading screen, etc.)

steps.action: Wait for next stage to load
steps.expected: Next stage loads successfully with new objectives

postconditions: Player is in the next stage
Previous stage is marked as completed
